Html:
LOVE WabbitEmu, but the ONLY way I can resize a skinned calculator (e.g. TI-84+) is to uncheck "use cutout skin", then right-click in the title bar, and choose Size.

Is this correct? I never ever see resize cursors any other way. Those steps above are a little complicated for entire department of math teachers with varying Windows skill levels...

Thanks!
You should actually get a resize cursor in the bottom right of the skinned calculator. On Windows 10 it's a little hard to grab
